infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AccessAid needs camera access to read text from images for accessibility purposes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: AccessAid needs microphone access for voice commands and speech recognition.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: AccessAid uses speech recognition to process voice commands for accessibility.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow AccessAid to access your camera to read text from images for accessibility purposes.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow AccessAid to access your microphone for voice commands and speech recognition.

plugins.brightnessPermission: Allow AccessAid to control screen brightness for accessibility preferences.
